SYSTEM: EN_terminology_in_ontologies%2817-03-09%29.pdf: Página 16
16
Non-hierarchical relations (ad-hoc 
relations)
– Caused by : (acid rain- nuclear explosion)
– Product of: (paper- wood pulp)
– Property of (compressibility -gas)
– Quantitative measure (temperature-heat)
– Instrument for (computer- data processing)
– Counter-agent for (insecticide- insects)
– Container of (toolbox- tools)
– Method of (diamond drilling- drilling)
– Material for (iron-bridge building)
– Place for (coal mine- coal exploitation)
– Associated with (production-consumption)
speaker: SYSTEM
